doc.field: C L f0952reute u f BC-slaughter-guesstimate 06-01 0072

Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 275,000 to 285,000 head versus 12,000 week ago and 276,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 126,000 to 132,000 head versus 6,000 week ago and 133,000 a year ago. Note: week ago figures reduced by Memorial Day holiday. Reuter
